gen:link.msg:message: `Allocations` MOET gelijk zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Allocations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Allocations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAllocationsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Allocations` MOET ook gerapporteerd worden, omdat minimaal één van de onderliggende waarden van `Allocations` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfAllocations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfAllocations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_Allocations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesCashFlowStatementNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_Allocations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
